name: Work Life Balance (mokofr, Leo Hilbert)
description:
Build a small community and keep your residents happy in this cozy building game.

Try to aim for a high happiness score and create picturesque villages with randomly rolled decorations.

Controls:

Mouse only - Just drag and drop the residents on different places to interact with them!

Press M to toggle the sound!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We created this game in 48h with 2 people for the Wholesome Gamejam 2022 and would love to see your villages! Feel free to drop a screenshot in the comments! :)

If you like to follow us: https://twitter.com/ConstanceGame

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GameJam Team name: Team Constance
